title: (x) Looking for a narrow sans similar to Bebas - various {gang}
content:
Good day. I am trying to source similar typefaces to the one attached. Its name is bebas, Lovely font but i just hoped to see others.

Thanks for your time wise ones!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture-12.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042649/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-12.jpg) | 32.23 KB |
author: insertmoney

comments.content:
Trade Gothic Bold Condensed

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/")

DIN 1451 Engschrift

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-1451/engschrift/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-1451/engschrift/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-1451/engschrift/")

Marc's suggestions are good. [Interstate Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042649/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.8030.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BUILT+NOT+TO+LAST&sampleSize=48) isn't far off, despite the 'O's.

I have found this one too. Seems to have a very even width all round.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-13_5299.jpg)
